changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-6741 Create new system parameters for KFS-CAM

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether or not the vendor is required for a non-moveable asset.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether or not the Manufacturer is required for a non-moveable asset.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-7158 Create CAM parameter NEW_IN_SERVICE_ASSET_DEPRECIATION_START_DATE

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: New in service asset depreciation start date (mm/dd) used for calculating the half year depreciation convention. The half year convention will calculate the depreciation date exactly six months from this parameter date.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Non Taxable Payment Reason Code - Royalties

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Non Taxable Payment Reason Code - Rental Payment

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Non Taxable Payment Reason Code - Travel Honorarium

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Set the number of days that will be added to the system date to calculate the due date.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Set this value to "SUMMARY" if you generate the summary statement as default. Set this value to "DETAIL" if you generate the detailed statement as default

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates the distribution method(s) an institution will support. The values will be S (Sequential), P (Proportional), S;P (both with Sequential as default), or P;S (both, with Proportional as default). With the Sequential method account segments will be expensed/disencumbered in the order in which they appear, up to the specified dollar amount. Percentages are used on account segments to indicate how "residual" amounts are to be funded. With the Proportional method account segments will be expensed/disencumbered proportionally. Dollar amounts are used on account segments only to assist in calculating a percent distribution. Residuals will also be funded proportionally.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicator to turn Cash receipt change request ability on and off.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether separation of duties should take place when the payee is the only approver on a DV value: Y

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates if an accounting line with zero dollar amount from Purchase Order document can be copied to Payment Request document.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates if Fiscal Officer can approve an accounting line that has zero dollar amount.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-6987 Employee Benefit Expense Calculation

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is enabled, the fringe benefit rate calculation will be performed using the benefit category code assigned to the account and labor benefit calculation type. When the parameter is not enabled, the fringe benefit will be calculated solely based on the fringe benefit type.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is enabled, the fringe benefit rate calculation will be performed using the benefit category code assigned to the cost share source account and labor benefit calculation type for the cost share sub-account. When the parameter is not enabled, the fringe benefit will be calculated solely based on benefit category code assigned to the grant account associated with the sub-account.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The number of errors allowed in the fringe and encumbrance generation process. When the file contains beyond this number, the output file will not be created in the origin entry directory.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is Y, the fringe benefit will be generated by the Enterprise Feeder Step for the corresponding salary actual amount.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: When this parameter is Y, the fringe benefit encumbrance will be generated by the Enterprise Feeder Step for the corresponding salary encumbrance amount.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If yes (Y), the labor benefit calculations will use an offset account to post offset entries to GL.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: A list of doc types that will be used for labor benefit offset calculation.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the default benefit rate category code on the account maintenance document by account type. The format is Account Type=Benefit Rate Category Code (eg. DT=AA;A1=BB, etc).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the default benefit rate category code on the account maintenance document for all accounts. This default code is used when the DEFAULT_BENEFIT_RATE_CATEGORY_CODE_BY_ACCOUNT_TYPE does not apply to an account. (two dashes) implies the category code is not applicable. The default cannot be null.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Add fields, create parameters, permissions, and roles for KFSMI-6702 Contribution

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Enables fiscal period field on financial documents for posting back to a previous period (year end processing).

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Number of periods previous to the current period to allow for year end posting.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: TURN ON AT YOUR OWN RISK; THIS FUNCTIONALITY IS NOT YET SANCTIONED BY THE KFS PROJECT. Document types for which the accounting period will be rendered for posting back to previous periods (year end processing). Use in conjunction with ENABLE_FISCAL_PERIOD_SELECTION_IND.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Controls whether the Year End Depreciation Job will process Retired Assets

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The month and day marking the last date of the fiscal year (0630 means June 30th).

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-7172 New Parameter UNORDERED_ITEM_DEFAULT_COMMODITY_CODE and new Commodity code 99200000

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If KFS is integrated with a Research Admin System with multiple award address types (such as Kuali Coeus) and accounts are being automatically created based on awards in that system, this parameter defines the address type that should be populated as the account address. The first address type listed will be used if a value exists. If not the second will be used and if no address of the second type exists the address of the third type will be used, etc.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-7146 Update value for Parameter VALID_PAYEE_TYPES_BY_PAYMENT_REASON

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-7165 correct ACCOUNT_ADDRESS_TYPE name and description

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The default commodity code for unordered items. If commodity code is enabled and required on purchase order items, this value will be populated as the default commodity code for all unordered items when a Purchase Order Amendment Document is created from a Line Item Receiving Document.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for warning message for when user clicks "add unordered item" button

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Indicates whether a warning message shall be given when a user clicks "add unordered item" button. When set to Y the user will receive a warning.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for semaphore processing interval

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Controls the frequency (in milliseconds) with which the batch container (BatchContainerStep) will check for semaphore step files to process. The semaphore files are created by the brte scripts via BatchStepTrigger.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-5346 cc address for ACH notifications

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The pdpSendAchAdviceNotificationsJob generates ACH payment summary email notifications for payees and copies of these emails are sent to the email address(es) specified in this parameter.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Updates the parameter KFS-SYS / Bank / BANK_CODE_DOCUMENT_TYPES to take out document types which permanently have bank codes.

update.where: NMSPC_CD = 'KFS-SYS' and CMPNT_CD = 'Bank' and APPL_ID = 'KFS' and PARM_NM = 'BANK_CODE_DOCUMENT_TYPES'

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameters for the from addresses and the to addresses for Disbursement Vouchers which were immediately extracted.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email address which sends out the notification that a disbursement voucher was prepared for immediate extraction.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Email addresses which receive notification that a disbursement voucher was prepared for immediate extraction.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-5918 subject for Collector notification e-mail when failures occur

column.name: VAL
column.value: File Uploaded Not Processed

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This is the subject line used when the collector sends out email relating to a file that failed validation.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Create parameters which turn on various fields in the ProcurementCardDefault business object

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If yes, accounting information is displayed / required on the Procurement Card Document Default maintenance document and accounting line information on the Procurement Card document is populated from Procurement Card Document Default table, if present. If accounting information does not exist in the reference table for a given credit card, the ERROR_TRANSACTION* parameter values will be used. If No, the accounting line information on the Procurement Card document is generated from the bank file.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If yes, cardholder information is displayed / required on the Procurement Card Document Default maintenance document and cardholder information on the Procurement Card document is populated from Procurement Card Document Default table, if present. If No, the cardholder information on the Procurement Card document is generated from the bank file.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameters to control the more finely tuned running of the Asset Depreciation job during the "blank out period," traditionally in the months around year end.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The run date to run the asset depreciation batch job during the blank out period.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The depreciation blank out period begin month and day (in format MM/DD) when the job should not run automatically.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The depreciation blank out period end month and day (in format MM/DD) when the job should not run automatically.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The run date (in format mm/dd/yyyy) to run the asset depreciation batch job during the blank out period.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-6809 which holds the e-mail address for notifications about the Asset Depreciation run date.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This email list to send a notification when blank out period run date is not set or not in blank out period range.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: New parameter on url to find Federal ACH Bank file from, plus update corresponding parameter with bad parameter detail type

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The URL of the file to download from the Federal ACH Bank Directory website. This file is then loaded into the ACH bank table.

update.where: nmspc_cd = 'KFS-PDP' and CMPNT_CD = 'All' and parm_nm = 'ACH_BANK_INPUT_FILE' and APPL_ID = 'KFS'

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-4452 to hold message when documents are locked out by other processes (such as pdp purap immediate extracts job)

column.name: VAL
column.value: This document is currently locked out for running batch job.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter is to set the default message for the various documents during the lockout time.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameters for several modules which have batch jobs that need to have specified from e-mail addresses for sent e-mails. Kalani did the sql on this one.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: From email address used for messages sent by the system.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: From email address used for messages sent by the system.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: From email address used for messages sent by the system.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: From email address used for messages sent by the system.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-6944 to specify run date for prior year job, so that job can be scheduled. Megha did the sql here.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The run date (in format MM/DD/YYYY ) to run the update prior year data job.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-7014 to activate or inactivate whether amount totaling occurs during post-processing.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Determines whether functionality to update a financial document's total amount during routing post-processing should be carried out.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-6319 to potentially override the campus used by the e-invoicing process. Megha did the original sql here.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter is to determine the campus for electronic invoice payments. If parameter value is populated, set the processing campus on the eInvoice generated PREQ to the parameter value. If parameter value is empty, use the Requisition initiator''s campus code.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter for KFSMI-6929 which lists labor ledger origin codes

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The list of origin codes which will cause a general ledger Entry's document number on a lookup to form a link to the list of labor ledger entries which created that general ledger entry.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter to perform cutoff of batch cycle.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Time, in 24 hour time format (hh:mm:ss), after which it is considered to be the next day for the purposes of evaluating RUN_DATE parameters. For example: Today is 9/27/2011, RUN_DATE=9/27/2011, RUN_DATE_CUTOFF_TIME=2:00:00. Due to a slow running schedule a job triggered by RUN_DATE does not have its turn until 1:00 9/28/2011. The job will still run because the cutoff time is 2 hours after midnight. In this case, anything running after 2:00 is considered the next day.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: New parameters for debarred vendor tracking process as well as the permission to upload the vendor exclusion file.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This parameter identifies the vendor types available as search criteria on the Vendor Exclusion and Debarred Unmatched Vendor lookups.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This indicates whether a warning or an error should be displayed when a debarred vendor is selected in a requisition. If Y then a warning is displayed. If N an error is displayed.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: This indicates whether a warning or an error should be displayed when a debarred vendor is selected in a purchase order. If Y then a warning is displayed. If N an error is displayed.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter which determines the max size of files which can be uploaded via batch upload.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The size limitation for batch file uploads in megabytes.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Adds parameter to specify the default asset manufacturer

column.name: VAL
column.value: UNIVERSITY CONSTRUCTED

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Default manufacturer name to be used during Asset Fabrication.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: The CFDA Code was moved into the COA module instead of CG.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: PDP Parameter NO_PAYMENT_FILE_TO_EMAIL_ADDRESSES evaluated incorrectly causing NPE

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: If set to Y PDP will send ACH email notifications to payees. If set to N PDP will not send these notifications.

update.where: PARM_NM = 'VALID_PAYEE_TYPES_BY_PAYMENT_REASON' AND NMSPC_CD='KFS-FP' AND CMPNT_CD = 'DisbursementVoucher' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'
PARM_NM = 'VALID_PAYEE_TYPES_BY_PAYMENT_REASON' AND NMSPC_CD='KFS-FP' AND CMPNT_CD = 'DisbursementVoucher' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'

column.name: VAL
column.valueNumeric: CASE WHEN val IS NULL THEN 'T' ELSE CONCAT( val, ';T' ) END

update.where: PARM_NM = 'CAPITAL_OBJECT_ACQUISITION_CODES' AND NMSPC_CD='KFS-CAM' AND CMPNT_CD = 'AssetGlobal' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Update date formats in the parameter table. But, only if they are unchanged from the released dataset.

update.where: VAL = '2008-04-01' AND PARM_NM = 'DEPRECIATION_RUN_DATE' AND NMSPC_CD='KFS-CAM' AND CMPNT_CD = 'Batch' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: Ensure all non knoreceipt emails are converted.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Defines the default benefit rate category code on the account maintenance document for all accounts. This default code is used when the DEFAULT_BENEFIT_RATE_CATEGORY_CODE_BY_ACCOUNT_TYPE does not apply to an account. -- (two dashes) implies the category code is not applicable. The default cannot be null.

update.where: PARM_NM = 'DEFAULT_BENEFIT_RATE_CATEGORY_CODE' AND NMSPC_CD='KFS-COA' AND CMPNT_CD = 'Account' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The list of accounts created after the start of a new fiscal year, but need to be used for the prior year and should be added to the Prior Year Account table by the batch job addPriorYearAccountsJob. If no such account exist, this parameter shall be left empty; otherwise, the value shall be in the format of "coaCode1-accountNumber1;coaCode2-accountNumber2;coaCode3-accountNumber3" and so on; for example, the value "BL-0142900;BA-1111111;UA-1000000" defines 3 accounts to be added. The value of this parameter shall be updated after each year end, before running addPriorYearAccountsJob.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: The basic accounting category type which will represent expenses in Account Balance by Consolidation lookups.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Display the functionality on a Requisition and Purchase Order document to trigger Positive Approval indicator. If this parameter is set to "N", the indicator will not be displayed on any document, and any functionality connected to the indicator will be turned off.

column.name: PARM_DESC_TXT
column.value: Display the functionality on a Requisition and Purchase Order document to trigger Receiving Required Indicator. If this parameter is set to "N", the indicator will not be displayed on any document, and any functionality connected to the indicator will be turned off.

changeSet.author: KFS50
changeSet.comment: KFSMI-8710 MAXIMUM_ACCOUNT_RESPONSIBILITY_ID parameter should be part of KFS-COA instead of KFS-CG

update.where: NMSPC_CD='KFS-CG' AND CMPNT_CD='All' AND PARM_NM='MAXIMUM_ACCOUNT_RESPONSIBILITY_ID' AND APPL_ID = 'KFS'
